{{Quote|At the Mummer's Ford girls of seven years were raped. And babes, still on their mother's breast were cut in two while their mothers watched!|[[Anguy]] to [[Sandor Clegane]]|And Now His Watch is Ended}}
The '''Mummer's Ford''' is a town in [[the Riverlands]], the region controlled by [[House Tully]] of [[Riverrun]].

The [[Battle at the Mummer's Ford]] was fought here in the opening days of the [[War of the Five Kings]]. Ser [[Gregor Clegane]] and his men battled the host sent by [[Eddard Stark]] under the leadership of Lord [[Beric Dondarrion]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Mummer's Ford is so-named because it is located on a ford across the Red Fork of the Trident.
